locations.title: Escape from the cold and gray - Cyprus
locations.description: Once upon a time, in the warm embrace of the Mediterranean, there was a vibrant town called Ayia Napa. Known for its golden beaches, crystal-clear waters, and lively atmosphere, Ayia Napa was a magnet for those seeking sun-soaked adventures. Our story begins with a group of friends—Emma, Jake, Mia, and Alex—who decided to embark on a memorable journey to this enchanting Cypriot paradise.

locations.title: Vienna
locations.description: In the heart of Europe, where the Danube River gracefully flows and history whispers through imperial palaces, Vienna transforms into a Winter Wonderland as snow blankets the cityscape. Our story unfolds in this magical setting, where a young couple, Clara and Stefan, decided to immerse themselves in the enchanting beauty of Vienna during the winter season.

locations.title: Want a good kebab - visit Berlin
Nothing to do in Winter Except Christmas markets - Dresden
locations.description: Kinda meh to be honest. Should have visted before the war
